TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 10}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "evoker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "lilac", "quantity": 30, "index": 22}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 4, "index": 25}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 29, "index": 34}, {"type": "wooden_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft birch stairs, I need to place birch planks in a specific pattern on the crafting table. The first step is to move one birch plank from slot 16 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
